{{Infobox TV channel| |name = MTV Classic | logofile = MTV Classic 2011 logo.png | logosize = 150px | share = 0.02% | share as of = 2008 | share source = {{cite web|url=http://www.auditel.it/doc/sintesiannuale2008.xls|title=Rapporto ANNO 2008|publisher=Auditel}} |launch = October 1, 2007 |picture format = [[Aspect ratio (image)#4:3 standard|4:3]] [[standard-definition television|SDTV]] |owner = [[MTV Italy]] ([[Telecom Italia Media]]) 51%
[[MTV Networks Europe]] ([[Viacom]]) 49% |country = {{flagcountry|Italy}} |web = http://www.mtvgold.it/ |sat serv 1 =[[SKY Italia]] |sat chan 1 =Channel 705 |}} '''''MTV Classic''''' is an Italian television channel and play '70, '80 and '90 music videos with related chart hits. The channel is based on the [[Videomusic]] library and broadcast only on [[SKY Italia]] channel 705 (however, it is also available on Italian [[IPTV]] services). Until [[January 10]], [[2011]] the name of the channel was [[MTV Gold]]. ==Logos== |MTV Gold logo (2007-2011) |Current MTV Classic logo (2011-present) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.mtvgold.it/ Official site] {{it icon}} {{Italian television stations}} {{MTV Networks Europe}} {{Viacom}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mtv Gold}} [[Category:MTV Networks]] [[Category:Telecom Italia Media]] [[Category:Music video networks]] [[Category:Television channels in Italy]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2007]] [[Category:Italian-language television stations]] {{italy-tv-station-stub}} [[cs:MTV Classic (ItÃ¡lie)]] [[it:MTV Classic (Italia)]] [[pt:MTV Classic (ItÃ¡lia)]]
